name: UI: Stylish Manager:  Style/Color Userstyle Types
description: Target: Addon Manager, Stylish UserStyles Manager.  Applies background color tweaks on userstyles that affect either the browser UI or all sites.
additional_info:
var 1.1: Added styling of userstyle entries having name/title beginning with a certain prefix (configurable) - currently browns out and fades userstyles beginning with "zzz".
ver 1.0: (initial release)

Notes:
Reddish background on browser UI styles.  Greenish background on styles affecting all sites.  Also slight tweak to default and currently selected items (eg, box-shadow).
